issue.title: audiobookbay.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://audiobookbay.com/abss/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Faudiobookbay.com%2Fabss%2F) ### Comment > Rule in Adguard Base filter no longer correct as legitimate download links are being filtered out along with ads. The rule: > audiobookbay.*#?#.torrent_info tr:has(a[rel=nofollow]:not([href^="/download?"])) > sets an exception for links to "/download" but the site has changed the link address to "/downld", therefore the rule should be: > audiobookbay.*#?#.torrent_info tr:has(a[rel=nofollow]:not([href^="/downld?"])) ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/qrm47yvk5b4kkwwc4s480csoo44k8g0ggenf5frfds.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
Yes, this script works great – thank you!  Is there a way to install it on Safari as well?

But why doesn’t AG’s tracking blockers ("Block trackers" and "Remove tracking parameters”) do this, as it's essential?

I haven't personally tried it w/ uBlock, but a user reported that it worked for this purpose in the Reddit post I linked.

I'm not sure what you mean by seeing tracking only in ads.  The search link I provided doesn't pull up any ads for me, and every Google search result has a Google tracking link (which this Greasy Fork script removes on Firefox).  Copy/paste them like I did, and you'll see.  I thought you already confirmed this though, so I'm confused.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Не повторяется.
Попробуйте очистить данные браузера, обновить фильтры (подождите около одной минуты), затем откройте сайт.

comment.body:
Не повторяется.
Попробуйте очистить данные браузера, обновить фильтры (подождите около одной минуты), затем откройте сайт.
Если это не поможет, вам следует повторно включить блокировщики контента (веб расширения) в настройках Safari (подождите примерно столько же времени, сколько и при обновлении фильтров).

---

В другом случае возможно, что некоторые правила применяются позже из-за ограничений со стороны Apple, поэтому видна реклама и это, к сожалению, не исправить.
